Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-56201 affecting package python-jinja2 for versions less than 3.0.3-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-56201 affecting package python-jinja2 for versions less than 3.0.3-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-jinja2 is earlier than 3.0.3-5, affected by CVE-2024-56201
